name: Food Surplus
description: Local crops thrive, hunters do very well, or livestock numbers are greater than expected. If this event occurs, it immediately ends any ongoing food shortage event.

criticalSuccess.msg: Your bumper crops include wild harvests that allow you to skip the entire Pay Consumption step of the Upkeep phase of your next Kingdom turn. @gain1d6Food

success.msg: Your excess crops lead to increased supplies. @lose2ConsumptionNextTurn and @gain1d6Food

failure.msg: The food surplus isn’t as huge as you’d expected. @lose1ConsumptionNextTurn

criticalFailure.msg:
What you thought was an excess of food is infested with spoilage, ergot, or other contamination. @gain1Unrest and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife
